abilities.name: Charge.
abilities.description: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 38 (7d10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 21 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked prone.

abilities.name: Labyrinthine Recall.
abilities.description: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
abilities.description: The goristro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

abilities.name: Siege Monster.
abilities.description: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.
